item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater...The love we have for each other is bigger than these small differences. And that's the key. It's like a big pie chart, and the love in a relationship has to be the biggest piece. Love can make up for a lot." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid." -- John Wayne

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by James A. Baldwin
item.description: "Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up." -- James A. Baldwin

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Who are you to judge the life I live? I know I'm not perfect -and I don't live to be- but before you start pointing fingers... make sure you hands are clean!" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Setiap hari cinta harus ditumbuhkan dengan berbagai cara. Cinta harus tumbuh menembus semua rintangan. Kuncup-kuncupnya tak boleh merekah semua seketika, untuk kemudian layu. Ranting dan pokoknya harus kuat menjulang. Cinta harus ditumbuhkan sepanjang usia dengan bunga-bunganya yang bertaburan di sepanjang jalan kesetiaan. Jalan yang ditapaki dengan riang di bumi dan semoga kelak mempertemukan kita kembali dengannya di surga" -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Try a little harder to be a little better." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You can get help from teachers, but you are going to have to learn a lot by yourself, sitting alone in a room." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I meant what I said and I said what I meant. An elephant's faithful one-hundred percent!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Penderitaan yang sesungguhnya adalah ketika kamu kehilangan kepercayaan diri dan harapan. Ketika Allah tak ada dalam tujuan hidupmu " -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "You are what you write." -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Sam Ewing
item.description: "When you feel neglected, think of the female salmon, who lays 3,000,000 eggs but no one remembers her on Mother's Day" -- Sam Ewing

item.title: Kerlip add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein
